thread.title: Carrie Brownstein Reviews Taylor Swift and Zayn’s “I Don't Wanna Live Forever”
thread.title_full: Carrie Brownstein Reviews Taylor Swift and Zayn’s “I Don't Wanna Live Forever”

author: Sam Sodomsky
title: Carrie Brownstein Reviews Taylor Swift and Zayn’s “I Don't Wanna Live Forever”
text:
Carrie Brownstein Reviews Taylor Swift and Zayn’s “I Don't Wanna Live Forever” “I associate Taylor Swift with some pretty kinky stuff.” Brownstein (Jesse Grant/Getty Images for AMC Networks); Swift (Kevin Winter/Getty Images for DIRECTV) 
Carrie Brownstein is a music critic on HBO’s “ Vice News Tonight ,” taking over for Patrick Carney . In her first segment, Brownstein takes on the task of reviewing “ I Don’t Wanna Live Forever ,” the new single from Taylor Swift and Zayn from the upcoming Fifty Shades Darker soundtrack. “I would be afraid to take the headphones off and play this song out loud—this would be an orgy so fast,” Brownstein says. Later, she adds, “I associate Taylor Swift with some pretty kinky stuff.” Watch the clip below. “Vice News Tonight” airs weeknights at 7:30 p.m. 
Read Pitchfork’s interview with Carrie Brownstein. Artists In This Story
